description: ff. 11. 198 x 137; 147 x 84 mm. 19 lin. 18th/19th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 579 (no. 104); S I, 798 (no. 108); Yaḥyá, Histoire, no. 13; attributed to al-Balbānī (India Off. 1408, cf. Yaḥyá, Histoire, I.c.), Multānī (India Off. 1409), ʻUmar al-Nasafī (India Off. 1410), ʻAbd Allāh ibn Masʻūd al-Balyānī (Mashhad, ḥikmah no. 683, with title Risālat ʻaynīyat al-wujūd and Ṭalas, al-Kashshāf, 3389/10, with title Risālah fī al-taṣawwuf). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى لم تکن قبل وحدانىته قبل
author: Ibn al-ʻArabī, 1165-1240
title: Kitāb al-Aḥadīyah
creator: Ibn al-ʻArabī, 1165-1240
subject: Sufism—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
